name: fyers-stock-scanner-pro
description: Fyers Stock Scanner Pro - Streamlit Application

scripts.build: echo 'Building Python Streamlit app...' && apt update && apt install -y python3-pip && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: npm run build && python3 -m streamlit run streamlit_app.py --server.port=$PORT --server.address=0.0.0.0
